subject: Re: New Hack
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Hey Nick,

No AC adaptor needed, it runs off a couple batteries.  When i came up 
with the hack originally for this model it seemed simple enough.  I 
posted detailed instructions the best i could up on my site 
keyportparanormal.com

I'm on the search today to try and find some other hackable radios at a 
flea market, i'll keep everyone posted.

-Steve H.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Nick" <thegreatwolf@...> wrote:
>
> Hey. We're about ready to buy the newest RS hack radio (the 200-125). 
I was wondering if we 
> needed to buy an ac adaptor for it.  It seems simple enough, but if i 
need it i have access to 
> crazy electronic people (the booth techies).  I saved the directions 
Bruce and various other 
> people posted.  
> 
> Thanks
> 
> Peace,
> Nick
>
